ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sourabh Sinha is a resident of Phil, PA, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently he is employed as a Senior Oracle PL/SQL Developer at COMCAST Corporation. Sourabh has extensive knowledge of Oracle, SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Oracle 10G, Oracle Report, Oracle Forms, Teradata, Oracle Discoverer 2000, Oracle 9i, Microsoft Excel, Informatica, ETL, SQL Server Integration Services, Python Programming, Linux Red Hat, Linux, Data Migration, shell scripting, TOAD, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Access, Java, C++, C Programming Language, SQLPlus, HP-UX, Web Services, SQL Developer 3.1, Reports 9i, Regression Testing, Oracle Developer 2000, Oracle 9i Application Server, Netscape Navigator, MS-SQLServer Server 2008, ECLiPSe, CPOS, Bash. So far Sourabh has not gained any managerial experience.
